name: Dessauer - The Smallest Details That Don't Belong To You

attributes.trait_type: The Smallest Details That Don't Belong To You

metadata.description:
I write this from a wooden hut in the jungle of a lesser known island in the Indian Ocean. 

Living in the blinks between timezones, I’ve documented the last 10 years of my life through 1000+ microsongs – threads of transient nostalgia captured on tape.

Now trading nature immersion for urban hustle, I’m knitting together the last decade via release. “Old Friends New Cities” is a collaboration with photography platform Analogue People, and 10 photographers (5 men and 5 women), from around the world.

Curating a collection of 10 photos paired with the music of Old Friends New Cities – Analogue People has juxtaposed the realities of nomadic city life over a longing familiar to the metropolitan among us – a return home; to nature and to our roots. 

Personally – this is about closing the loop. With this release I say goodbye to Old Friends New Cities – and hello to all of you.

-dessauer

lyrics.text:
Song: The Smallest Details That Don’t Belong To You
Artist: Dessauer
Collection: Old Friends New Cities
Curator: Analogue People

Year: 2023
